title: Sound On: LGBT Rights, Economic Stimulus
itunes:title: Sound On: LGBT Rights, Economic Stimulus
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Nikki Schwab, Senior U.S. Political Reporter, with the U.K. Daily Mail, Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court Reporter, Congressman Fred Keller, U.S. Representative for Pennsylvania's 12th congressional district, Sean Duffy, Former U.S. Congressman, and spokesman for the RNC.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
